mapper.insert: insert into supplier_recode (id, supplier_id, goods_id, unit_price, quantity, total_price, create_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update supplier_recode set supplier_id = #{supplierId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, goods_id = #{goodsId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, unit_price = #{unitPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, quantity = #{quantity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, total_price = #{totalPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, supplier_id, goods_id, unit_price, quantity, total_price, create_time from supplier_recode
